data.message: I have loved Eminem since I was a teenager.....mid 30s now......I thought I'd always love his music.......until today. I saw the "trump" song.......I thought you were better than all the sheep in this country. I actually thought that you thought for yourself and didn't listen to everyone else.......p.s., no form of gun control or reform would have made a difference in las Vegas. What could have made a difference? Maybe the bellhop should have spoke up instead of being greedy when he was given $100 tips from the guy. Or anyone else employed there, anyone could have spoken up about his odd behavior and the odd amount of "luggage" he had..........

replies.message: I would like to remind you that most people are capable of making decisions for themselves.  Strangely enough, some of the decisions or opinions can differ from yours.  Take a breath...this is ok.  This is life on a planet with 7 billion people.  This is what all those people have died for.  This is actually called individuality.
